reviews.review: One of the best video games I have ever played!
Потрясающее продолжение игры-головоломки. Сюжет игры увлекает как в одиночной игре, так и в кооперативном режиме. Отличная атмосфера игры не дает скучать.

Portal 2 is the direct sequel to acclaimed Portal. 
The game is exactly what you expect, as it inherits all the features of the previous Portal game with additions.  
Unlike Portal, Portal 2 has a proper story which is unveiled as you journey through the game. You learn more of Glados, more of Aperture Science, and the person behind all of this.  

There is no real negative of the game, as the game gives you exactly what you expect (which could be it's only negative). 

For those who are new to the Portal series, prepare for headaches as you portal your way from ground to roofs to walls.

Portal 2 is fun. I'd definitely recommend playing it. If you didn't like the first game, this one isn't going to change you mind. If you did like the first one, Portal 2 is more of the same.  It is basically a continuation of the first game. Good storytelling. Good gameplay. I never got a chance to play the co-op with anything, but I think that would be fun.

Unfortunately, I pulled the trigger on this game way to early in its lifespan and purchased it at $25. I don't think it is worth it at that price, but I'd recommend it at $5. 

I will update this review to be more in-depth at a later time.

Is Portal 2 my favorite game of all time? Hard to say but it was certainly my most anticipated game of all time. More than Diablo 3 (big let down) and Bioshock Infinite.

This game has it all. You can't really tell me you haven't played it. Right?

Up side:
1. New mechanics (gels, light bridges)
2. Cooperative play so that 2 of you can scratch your heads together
3. Great addition to the storyline.
4. Vast areas

Down side:
1. I want more? Yea, that's pretty much it. 

I've played it through twice and continue to hope for an official oculus port so I have an excuse to play a 3rd time.
Fun even after the single player campaign is complete!
funny jokes and puzzles, good buy.

Portal 2 makes the original one looks better: humour, puzzles, characters, co-op and definatly the story. Really worth getting!
10/10
P.S GLaDosFTW!

Campaign was still a little short for my tastes, and this game will introduce something and then immediatley move on to something else, without using the thing again. This game just needed a bit more breathing room, and more cake.

Portal 2. It's awesome. Get it!

Because it's Portal (2).

Puzzle Gaming Library must have! This Game and its originator set the standard for story and puzzle gameplay within the genre.

Need to know Pro vs. Con:

Pro:
Unlimited playability. Beat your time. Build a billion maps. play community maps. co-op everything. it really never ends
Fun
Excellent Controls
challenging in a enjoyable way(very little rage quit likelihood)

Con:
...cake
Its okay I guess
Excelente juego, excelente mecanica, excelente personajes, excelente dialogos un multijugador que aunque no lo he jugado mucho es muy divertido
The story is great and the game is better than the first.
Awesome Game

another game where the story forces you to play, its just that interesting and amusing. the characters are really amusing. Cave Johnson is hilarious, he's gonna burn your house down, with the lemons (search for it, its a quote from the game)

the mechanics are awesome and the puzzles are really challenging. The story is truly good, really explains what happened and why Aperture went down. the controls work well and the voice acting is funny.

Tutto sommato, chi non conosce Portal? Unico nel suo genere, nato da una mente altrettanto geniale.
Cercare di risolvere enigmi, in un'ambientazione spettacolare, creando portali da attraversare in modi sempre più complicati. La storia è appassionante e suggestiva e vi terrà incollati al pc per molto tempo.
Inoltre, sono state inserite varie novità in questo capitolo, che lo rendono ancora più grande del precedente, come la possibilità di giocare in coop e/o in sfide multigiocatore e di creare livelli personalizzati con un editor incorporato, per poi pubblicarle sul Workshop di Steam.

Giocabilità: ★★★★★
Longevità: ★★★★✰
Grafica: ★★★★✰
Audio: ★★★★✰
[b]VOTO COMPLESSIVO:[/b] ★★★★✰

Thanks to the steam workshop (and the great geniuses contributing creating challenging and intelligent chambers) this could be considered in my opinion as a completely innovative game where the goal of each chamber is to make you think. The huge diversity of chambers created each week by community makes this game an infinite and ever new fun. If I had to choose only one game to play the rest of my life, it would definitely be the Portal 2, a true masterpiece of the valve and his beautiful source engine.

Just finished the campaign/Singleplayer mode. Awesome game. I have played Portal, and this game answers all the questions I had from the original plus many more intricate details that I never would have thought to even wonder. The graphics are amazing and the new features present are staggering and complex. Even after just finishing this game I will probably play through the campaign again simply because it is such a superb game. :)
7/10. Fun, but I don't think I'd play it more than once. Co-op was fun as well.

Welcome to Aperture Laboritories, We Do What We Must, Because We Can! I loved this game sooooo much. The level design and story are what really shined in this game for me. The story is extremely well written and kept me being surprised by plot turns I, for one, did not see coming. (Sorry no spoilers here!) The level design in this game is also extremely good, the puzzles you complete in this game will keep the gears in your head turning while not frustrating you to the point of giving up. But even when you complete the story, there is a multiplayer campaign you can play with one of your friends, AND if that wasn't enough you can create and share levels to the Steam workshop and can download levels created by other users to keep you playing. I find this an extremely useful tool keeping the games replayability at a max level. I loved this game and would recommend it to anyone. Top notch game, definitely buy it! Oh and did I mention the graphics are spectacular?! Especially being from 2011. They still match some top notch graphics in games from this year, in my opinion at least. 

Overall Score -> 10/10

+Level Design
+Story
+Multiplayer
+Level creator/sharer
+Community
+Graphics
+++

A splendid successor of its previous game, Portal 2 is the best you can ever get. Prepare to get immersed in a chaotic arrangement of puzzles, plot lines and climactic points that will simply leave you breathless. Plus, there is even a two-player mode, so you can always test if that friend of yours is as bright as a lightbulb, or simply as rusty as a corrupted core.

[It's hard to overstate my satisfaction]
Very Fun and Challenging! 10/10
Very enjoyable for smart minds that can "Think with portal's" <3
I liked it.
Portal 2 improves everything from the first game. It has a better, longer story and a greater variety of puzzles. Oh and its even more hilarious than the first game.

Brilliant game. Fun gameplay and puzzles, very cool environment and story.

A masterpiece!

Brilliant and bizarre puzzle game that it's a great addition to the sleeper hit that was the first Portal. Wheatley takes the cake (Pun Intended) as the best Personality Core ever, with that blatant Ricky Gervais/Stephen Merchant style. GLaDOS is as funny/creepy as ever, and Cave Johnson/Daily Bugle editor is a great addition. And I used way too many forwardslash in this text.

Logic-focused game packed in fun, joke-ish and addictive game-play. This one goes to my personal "Hall of fame".

Pure fun, go for it, it's worth any money!
Шикарно!

incredible game by valve.  first was short but great and this one made it a million times better.  best wait and buy ever.  still play SP now and then cause the story was so good and so many easter eggs :D deff recommend
Great game. Really funny and great atmosphere.
Even better than first one.

Art is not only about paintings and sculptures. This game is a masterpiece of art in modern culture. Valve demonstrated once again that computer games can be complex art as well. The developers created a wonderful composition of music, sound,  graphics and story-telling bundled in an appealing structure of bits and bytes. The game mechanics are innovative and simple at the same time.
Dive into the world of Aperture Science and experience the progress from a simple shower curtain manufacturer to a high-tech laboratory controlled by a "committed" -Genetic Lifeform and Disk Operating System-. Many "WOWs" and "OMGs" are guaranteed. This game is a must have!
After playing this game long enough, your brain matter will go from tenderized jello to a state of doubled IQ
One of the best games I have ever played!!! It's incredible.  Now buy it.  Go on get!! Go buy it!!!!!! NOW. DO IT NOW.

it is an awsome and great game.
very fun
Muito bom

10/10
I love the gameplay, the storyline, the graphics and the physics. Valve make awesome games and this is a great example. I love it.
There is not enough potatoes.
Really good game to play on you're on ang GLaDOS is great fun. CO-OP is also a great amount of fun to play with a friend.
THE GAME THAT EVOLVED THE GENRE. MUST HAVE!! 10/10
Thrilling from the first moment and delicatly funny without trying hard.

Portal 2 is brilliant for its physics and writing. Not only is the game fun and funny enough to drive you through the single player, but the the physics and level editor/workshop integration make this game essentially endless. The only fault of it is that the single player campaign could have been longer, but it's such a small complaint, it's pretty insignificant.
Fun stuff
If you enjoy resolving puzzles, this is your game. Physics will play with you, and, 2 voices, will be very funny to listen all the game. Also, history is really good.

Valve's sellout title is back for a sequel, and man, what a sequel. This is the game that is so good, I replay it every few months. Unique and imaginative storyline, amazing voice acting, visuals, environments and a devotion to gathering science makes Portal 2 one of the games I would recommend that everyone play at least once in their lifetimes.

When I first completed the single-player portion of Portal 2 I couldn't believe how short it was. Then I looked at my Steam play time and realised something; it wasn't that the game was short, it was just that I'd been enjoying it so much, and was trying to beat the tests as fast as possible to find out what happened next in the story, that when the end came, I just couldn't accept it. So I did something that has probably only ever happened once or twice before; I immediately played the whole thing through again.
Nobody crafts a game quite like Valve.
Inteligenta, zabawna, logiczna, wciągająca ;-)
IMO its better than the first one. Challenging gameplay and a funny story make it great
Le meilleur jeu de Valve après les Half Life 2

What can i say about this game that would make someone choose to buy this or not, if you are not a puzzle lover then this is not the game for you. But even saying that means that people miss out on the strange story combined with some of the funniest dialogue in years from either movies or video games. The introduction of Wheatley was a great choice and he just like Glados was only following his programming when he wakes up Chel and brings her into this sequel. 

I still haven't had a chance to play the Co-Op but everyone says it is some of the best Co-Op play in years so I am looking forward to that. 

The game has a good amount of gameplay so you can't finish this as fast as some could finish the original Portal and the ability to create your own Test Chambers to test other players is adding tons of re-playability.

This is a perfect 10 if you love the Portal gameplay style, and if you want to just follow where the story goes then this is a 10 on the story as well.
Muy buen juego, lo mejor es jugar en modo cooperativo!
One of the best games I have ever played. BTW great replay value with thousands of cummunity made levels.
more fun- more brain=)
Ein muss für jeden Gamer :D
very fun and creative!
Outstanding and better than the first in every way

Es el juego de puzzles por excelencia. Introduce y utilizima muchísimas mecánicas nuevas con respecto a Portal, a parte de darle un nuevo giro a una historia muy bien llevada. El humor ácido de GLaDOS nos acompañará durante la mayor parte del recorrido y por fin descubriremos quién es y porque se comporta asi. La campaña es bastante larga, aunque merece la pena desacelerar un poco y disfrutar del juego relajadamente, alargando asi un par de hora el gameplay. De todas maneras es bastante rejugable, y aun sabiendonos la historia, el juego es capaz de ponernos en situación y hacernos sentir cosas mediante empatía con los personajes del juego. Por si fuera poco, en caso de que la campaña nos haya parecido corta, el modo coop nos puede dar otro montón de horas de diversión (mejor si es con un conocido). Sin duda es un "must have" como una casa.
Better than the first one, arguably, funnier, better level design, better voice acting, just overall better.

A découvrir absolument ! En solo, la campagne tient en haleine une petite dizaine d'heures grâce à la même recette que Portal premier du nom : des puzzles et énigmes à résoudre à l'aide de notre Portal Gun dans un univers incroyablement attachant. En co-op, simplement le meilleur jeu auquel j'ai joué : des niveaux toujours plus tordus et une narration toujours aussi comique. Bref, pas mal d'heures de fous rires en perspective !
Да,да и еще раз да!
The dialogue is perfection and the delivery exceptional.  Gameplay is challenging and varied without growing tedious.  A masterpiece of pacing and delivery
Egy rövid kikapcsolódás egyedül vagy co-opban. Nem egy hosszú kaland, de nagyon megéri az árát.

One of the most brilliant games ever made. The gameplay, humor, characters, and wittiness are astonishing. The co-op was some of the most fun I ever had. Do yourself a favor and get this AND the first Portal if you haven't already.
A Valve classic that cannot be passed up.
Zdecydowanie warta polecenia gra. Świetnie wygląda na moim słabym laptopie. O ile nie przeszedłem, to polecam.
Interesting story that makes you want to complete every chapter of this game. Also requires good coordination in co-op.

"Portal 2" уникальная в своем роде. Других подобных игр в жанре "Экшн" нет.  Эта игра основана на головоломках, которые не так легко развязать. В "Portal 2" нужно думать, мыслить. Это не "стрелялка", где ты стреляешь и тупеешь. Эта игра заставляет тебя "встряхнуть" серым веществом.

Также в игре очень затягующий сюжет, который не отпускает тебя до самого окончания.
História ótima , Graficos lindo e tudo que a de bom em jogabilidade , sem duvida meu jogo favorito =P
Good game, but I think that its too easy...
Потрясающая игрушка!Не зря считается всемирно признанным шедевром.

If someone were on a video games aren't art crusade. But were fair enough to give one game a chance to change theyir mind. This would be the game I'd give them. It's just damn near perfect in every way and you really have to go deep into nitpick teritory to find any flaw whatsoever. Only a few games can make that claim and this is definetly pne of them.
Imprescindible.
Great humor, great game...
El mejor juego de puzles y fisicas hasta la fecha en mi opinión. Historia inolvidable y con un final que no dejará indiferente a nadie que lo haya jugado.

Re-writing my recommendation because I feel the need to go more indepth about it. Portal 2 is a fun puzzle game that has interest visuals and characters. As with most Valve games, the levels are extremely detailed and well designed. It comes great as a sequel to portal: it contains great puzzles that will take time to think over to even a player who was replayed portal over and over hoping to breeze through it, new and interest puzzle elements, and an interesting environment. I always find myself looking at the self-reconstructing panels with awe, it gives you a sense that place is alive and self-aware which sets a nice threatning atmosphere, even moreso with GLaDOS's lines. 

However, there are a few problems with it. Such as the parts inbetween levels which can drag out for awhile because you have to look around large detailed rooms to find a way just to get to the next puzzle. Which are NOT puzzles themselves for the most part, since the problem usually is just finding a portable surface, and from there its almost simple. Thus it makes the game really long to where it loses replay value compared to the first portal. Co-op is a fun and interesting idea and introduces new challenges, however the only real problem with Co-op is the people playing co-op. Its usually one guy doing all the work and the other guy snapping because he didn't let him figure it out for himself. So I recommend Co-op with people you know rather than  matchmaking.

Overall and TL;DR: Its a GREAT game and I recommend it if you like puzzles or not. +there is custom level designs that create new experiences and challenges, making it an never-ending game of puzzles to enjoy for a long long time.

Geniale Story, sehr gutes Gameplay, witzige Dialoge, einfach ein must have Titel
Danke Valve ;)

Not only is this a moderately challenging puzzle game, but it's one of the funniest things I've ever experienced! I thought I would be able to catch up on some podcasts while working through these levels, but to do that would be to terribly miss the hilarious back-and-forth. If you don't laugh at this game, then you have no soul.

Portal was the experiment, Portal 2 is the full AAA experience. It couldn't be as groundbreaking as Portal and one could have the feeling the game relies on its heavy use of dialogues to make you forget that it's basically Portal again.

The new gameplay mechanics take a while to appear and sometimes the game might feel too long for what it is.

BUT then again, at other times I do enjoy the dialogues quite a lot. I had the fun of a lifetime hearing them for the first time. I had the fun of a lifetime going through a much less confined environment than in the first game and while not quite the perfect game, it's in my list of games one should definitely have played once in their lifetime.
this is madness
афигенна)
really fun!

Portal 2 has an amazing storyline, really cool puzzles, and lots of really cool stuff beyond "Oh put a portal here and there and you're done". I've replayed it many times and if you don't like the storyline then there's lots of cool workshop puzzles to do. 9/10
Best game I have ever played. Ever.

総合評価　１０／１０

良い所
　オリジナリティ。
　パズルの出来。
　ゲームプレイ。
　演出。
　前作PORTALをプレイいていなくても十分楽しめる。（マザーXと戦って倒したことだけを知っていれば良い）

悪い所
　一人称視点によるポジションやタイミングの取り辛さ。（前作よりは改善されている）
　前作PORTALをプレイ済みだからといって物語に深みが増すわけではない。

確かな手応えのあるアクションパズルゲーム。
難易度、ボリュームともに満足の行く内容で退屈させない演出を折込、最後まで飽きさせずにプレーさせてくれる。
演出もパズルの合間合間にふんだんに織り込まれてくるので調度よい息抜きやアクセントとなっている。
（安易なムービーではない演出でゲームプレイの邪魔をしない）


細かい部分でいくつか気になるところはあるものの、それらの欠点が気にならないくらいによく出来ている。

日本語は字幕のみ対応。
（設定 ＞ オーディオ ＞ クローズドキャプション ＞ 字幕のみ）
Really fun!
Un de mes jeux préférés, puzzle très bien fait, histoire complexifiée par rapport au 1. Achetez-le.

Вы любите думать? Если так - то эта игра для вас. Увлекательный сюжет захватит вас и не отпустит до самого конца, вы побываете в таких местах Apperture Science, о которых даже не подозревали, а элементы головоломки и целая туча пасхальных яиц не дадут вам заскучать даже на самом сложном уровне(что вряд ли, уровни в этой игре идут постепенно, от простого к сложному, так что у вас вряд ли получится забросить игру на середине). Также один из огромнейших плюсов - это цена. 200(а иногда, во время скидок, и 100, и 50) рублей за игру - смешная цена. Итак, если вы хотите поиграть во что-то необыкновенное - скорее хватайте ваш кошелёк и покупайте эту игру. Клянусь, вы не разочаруетесь. Valve умеет делать хорошие игры, и они ещё раз это доказывают.

UPD 2016. Игра достойна номинации "Злодей, которого хочется обнять"
